valueProposition.title: Grid Applicability and Investment Decision Discipline
valueProposition.body: AFA Energy is positioned as a technical verification center for grid compatibility and investment readiness analysis in Romania's renewable energy market. Our assessments provide independent analyses aligned with investment committee standards, free from conflicts of interest.
